thread.title: Donna Hay's salted caramel and chocolate brownie recipe
thread.title_full: Donna Hay's salted caramel and chocolate brownie recipe - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Donna Hay's salted caramel and chocolate brownie recipe
text: Looking for a gourmet getaway? Discover delicious food and fine wine in Australia » This is a recipe from Donna Hay's cookbook the new easy Ingredients Makes 16 squares 3/4 cup (120g) plain (all-purpose) flour 1⁄8 teaspoon baking powder 1 1/4 cups (220g) brown sugar 2 eggs 1/3 cup (120g) store-bought caramel filling or dulce de leche 2 teaspoons vanilla extract 150g unsalted butter, melted 150g dark chocolate, chopped 1/2 teaspoon sea salt flakes Method Preheat oven to 160°C (325°F). Place the flour, baking powder and sugar in a bowl and mix to combine. Add the eggs, caramel, vanilla and butter and whisk until smooth. Stir though the chocolate and spoon the mixture into a 20cm square cake tin lined with non-stick baking paper. Sprinkle with the sea salt flakes and bake for 40-45 minutes or until just firm around the edges. Cut into squares and serve warm or cold. Prize draw: win a gourmet getaway in Australia » You may also be interested in: • Quinoa, kale and preserved lemon fritters recipe » • Nectarine and coconut tart recipe »
